Giant squid have eyes the size of frisbe: Are accompianed by yellow fin tuna
Pups and males steal food from females
Wean their pups sowly sometime nursing as long as two years; mothers teach pups to hunt and dive
can hold their breath for more than 100 minutes
Use their tusks to haul their bodies from the water by hooking into the ice
Harbor seals have been found basking in moored boats
Feeding frenzy of tuna drives schools of smaller fish toward the surface
Evolved from four-legged land mammals more than 60 million years ago.
Depend on shifting pack ice for access to seals (food source)
